mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R JOIN WINE W ON R.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE 1=1 AND RE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER BY RE_NO DESC AND RE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER BY RE_NO DESC
AND W_NM_K LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR W_NM_E LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER BY RE_NO DESC
ORDER BY RE_NO DESC

SELECT R.*, W.W_NM_K, W.W_NM_E, W.W_IMAGE1 FROM REVIEW R JOIN WINE W ON R.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE 1=1 AND RE_PHOTO1 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RE_NO DESC ORDER BY RE_DATE DESC ORDER BY RE_LIKE DESC ORDER BY RE_NO DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT R.*, W.W_NM_K, W.W_NM_E FROM REVIEW R JOIN WINE W ON R.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE 1=1 AND RE_PHOTO1 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RE_LIKE DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R JOIN WINE W ON R.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE 1=1 AND RE_PHOTO1 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RE_NO DESC ORDER BY RE_DATE DESC ORDER BY RE_LIKE DESC ORDER BY RE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE W_NO = #{w_no};
SELECT R.*, W.W_NM_K, W.W_IMAGE1, W_PRICE FROM REVIEW R JOIN WINE W ON R.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE RE_NO=#{re_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_LIST O JOIN REVIEW R ON O.W_NO = R.W_NO WHERE O.ID = #{id} AND O.W_NO = #{w_no} AND O.ORD_STAT='배송완료';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE ID = #{id} AND W_NO = #{w_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (W_NO, ID, RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT, RE_SCORE, RE_PHOTO1, RE_PHOTO2, RE_PHOTO3, RE_DATE) VALUES (#{w_no},#{id},#{re_title},#{re_content},#{re_score},#{re_photo1},#{re_photo2},#{re_photo3},now());
